agenda.description: HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Elections TIME & DATE: 9:00 AM, Monday, March 11, 2019 PLACE: E2.016 CHAIR: Rep. Stephanie Klick HB 431 Shaheen Relating to ineligibility to serve as a poll watcher. HB 1241 Bucy Relating to the content of a polling place location notice. HB 1421 Israel Relating to cybersecurity of voter registration lists and other election-related documents, systems, and technology. HB 1459 González, Jessica Relating to the appointment of early voting boards, including the signature verification committee. HB 1850 Klick Relating to requiring counties to publish voter information during the early voting period. HB 1888 Bonnen, Greg Relating to temporary branch polling place hours of operation. NOTICE OF ASSISTANCE AT PUBLIC MEETINGS Persons with disabilities who plan to attend this meeting and who may need assistance, such as a sign language interpreter, are requested to contact Stacey Nicchio at (512) 463-0850, 72 hours prior to the meeting so that appropriate arrangements can be made.
